options.nature: Noticing how the outdoors steadies you shows your resilience in grounding moments.
options.people: Appreciating someone today reinforces the support network you can lean on.
options.self: Recognizing your own progress honors the effort you've invested in growth.

options.high: High energy can be channeled into creating momentum on what matters most.
options.steady: Steady energy is a reminder that consistency often beats intensity.
options.low: Lower energy invites gentle pacing and self-compassion so you can recover fully.

options.friend: Reaching out to a friend highlights your capacity to nurture relationships.
options.family: Family touchpoints remind you of your roots and the stories that shaped you.
options.community: Choosing community shows how belonging helps you feel anchored.

options.create: Leaning into creating gives you a tangible way to express what's inside.
options.learn: Learning something new keeps your curiosity alive and adaptive.
options.rest: Resting intentionally is an active choice to protect your attention and clarity.

options.joy: Joy arriving unannounced is evidence that you can hold lightness even on tough days.
options.calm: Calm is a clue that your routines are quietly supporting you.
options.tension: Feeling tension means your values want some attention; listening is the first step.
